articles.description: Vedanta stood at the top spot in terms of deal size with Twin Star Holdings selling stake worth Rs 3,983 crore. Copthall Mauritius, Societe Generale bought stakes worth Rs 2,194 crore and Rs 761 crore, respectively, in the metal major.
articles.content: The week gone by saw Nifty50 settling 0.66% lower over the previous week. Yet it was not without action as prominent bulk, block and insider deals worth Rs 10,710 crore were executed during the week.… [+2248 chars]

articles.title: At Rs 16,884 crore, SBI posts highest quarterly profit - The Economic Times
articles.description: Net profit more than doubled year-on-year to a high of ₹16,884 crore in the quarter ended June 2023, beating Bloomberg's ₹14,949-crore estimate. The bank had turned in a net profit of ₹6,068 crore in the corresponding period last year.
articles.content: State Bank of India (SBI) beat its quarterly profit record for the fourth time in a row as lending expanded across the board and bad loans plunged to a decadal low, reducing the need for provisions a… [+2175 chars]
